description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. He's a gamer, a bootlegger, a photographer and a connoisseur of the Ladies!  Purchase “Trailer Park King” now to get a free invisible stamp that says “I dated the Greeter”!
